trans-unit.source: Server Replication vs <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> Replication

seg-source.mrk: Server Replication vs <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> Replication

target.mrk: Réplication de serveur vs Réplication <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText>

trans-unit.source: If you enable server replication, existing <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> specific replication processes are disabled, even though their configuration is kept. Server replication configuration takes precedence over the other replication processes available, and its parameters override existing <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> specific replication parameters:

seg-source.mrk: If you enable server replication, existing <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> specific replication processes are disabled, even though their configuration is kept.

Server replication configuration takes precedence over the other replication processes available, and its parameters override existing <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> specific replication parameters:

target.mrk: Si vous activez la réplication du serveur, les processus de réplication spécifiques à l'<MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> sont désactivés, même si leur configuration est conservée.

La configuration de réplication serveur est prioritaire par rapport aux autres processus de réplication disponibles, et ses paramètres priment sur les paramètres de la réplication <MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.ALN" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Agent</MadCap:conditionalText><MadCap:conditionalText MadCap:conditions="ALN.HSS" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Hyperstream</MadCap:conditionalText> spécifique :

trans-unit.source: The target server is the one defined in the server replication.

seg-source.mrk: The target server is the one defined in the server replication.

target.mrk: Le serveur cible est celui qui est défini dans la réplication globale.

trans-unit.source: The port is the one set by the HN_TARGET_HTTP_PORT tunable. See Replication Prerequisites for details on this tunable.

seg-source.mrk: The port is the one set by the HN_TARGET_HTTP_PORT tunable.

target.mrk: Le port est défini par le paramètre HN_TARGET_HTTP_PORT.
